allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: initial project setup with 5 skills across 3 plugin categories

- Add productivity-skills plugin \(task-manager, note-taker\)
- Add development-skills plugin \(code-reviewer, test-generator\)
- Add ai-generation-skills plugin \(nanobabana-image-generator\)
- Include comprehensive documentation \(README, CONTRIBUTING, CHANGELOG\)
- Support bilingual documentation \(English/Chinese\)
- Add MIT license

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
